headline: LyondellBasell (LYB) Climbs 5% After $1.5-Billion Fundraising
summary: We recently published Market in Turmoil but These 10 Stocks Are on Fire. LyondellBasell Industries NV (NYSE:LYB) is one of the best-performing stocks on Thursday. Lyondell jumped by 5.10 percent on Thursday to close at $45.52 apiece as investors repositioned portfolios following the successful raising of $1.5 billion in fresh funds through two debt offerings. […]

headline: Why LyondellBasell (LYB) Is Up 7.4% After Third-Quarter Loss and Hints at Profit Rebound
summary: LyondellBasell Industries reported a net loss of US$892 million for the third quarter of 2025 on revenues of US$7.73 billion, compared to a net income of US$571 million and revenues of US$8.60 billion a year prior. Despite the weak third-quarter results, management highlighted progress on its cash improvement plan and expects improved profitability in the fourth quarter as catalyst demand and license milestone revenues recover. We’ll examine how LyondellBasell’s strong cash conversion and...

headline: Keep Calm And Collect Big Income: Yields +10%
summary: Income investors don't need to be in the business of predicting Mr. Market's next move. Click here to read about two overlooked income picks with tax-advantaged yields up to 13%.

headline: What Are Wall Street Analysts' Target Price for LyondellBasell Industries Stock?
summary: LyondellBasell Industries has significantly underperformed the broader market over the past year, and analysts remain cautious about the stock’s prospects.
